long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HappySupport Recorder is a Chrome extension that can be used to effortlessly create help articles. It automatically captures and documents step-by-step processes as you perform them in your browser. This extension records your actions, generates GIFs to illustrate the steps, and produces comprehensive, easily editable help articles. By using the HappySupport Recorder, you can significantly reduce the time and effort required for manual documentation, while ensuring consistent and SEO-friendly support articles.
